page.title: 03CLOTHES
page.content: Today is not a very warm day in July I am wearing a blouse, a torquoise skirt and a burgundy batwing 'v' neck jumper with a pink stripe down the arms. I have ankle socks and cool, canvas shoes. I don't have to wear a{uniform at my school but my brother who goes to{Bodmin Comprehensive School}does. He has to wear a blue shirt, a school tie , black trousers, grey socks, black shoes, grey jumper and a blazer. We don't see many people with adult uniforms. Most of this area consists of farms so the general clothes for men and women when working are trousers, mainly made of denim, cotton shirts and T shirts. In the winter they wear{wellies. }When grownups dress up they wear suits, but today a lot of clothes are{unisex - suitable {for male and female.
